scripts.deploy: npm run contract:install && npm run contract:compile && npm run contract:generate && npm run contract:push
scripts.network: concurrently "npm run peer:requestor" "npm run peer:trainer" "npm run celestial"
scripts.migrate:peer-requestor: go run main.go --utils migrate:peer --direction up --peerType requestor
scripts.migrate:peer-requestor:down: go run main.go --utils migrate:peer --direction down --peerType requestor
scripts.migrate:peer-trainer: go run main.go --utils migrate:peer --direction up --peerType trainer
scripts.migrate:peer-trainer:down: go run main.go --utils migrate:peer --direction down --peerType trainer
scripts.peer:requestor: npm run migrate:peer-requestor && go run main.go --type peer --peerType requestor --extAddress :5002
scripts.peer:trainer: npm run migrate:peer-trainer && go run main.go --type peer --peerType trainer --extAddress :6001
scripts.celestial: npm run migrate:celestial && go run main.go --type celestial
